title: anudinamunai
sahitya:
anudinamunai bhajanai puriya varam aruLvAi meyyanbar kuzhAmuDan


anupallavi

  unadu maNi mADa vIdigaL nAngilum uLLanboDum innishaiyoDum uLLurugi


caraNam    un tiru nAmangaLaiyum karuNai mudal uttama guNa vaibhavangaLaiyum uyar
tenralinum iniya sangItamoDum tamburA shrutiyODum ulagai marandu          (anu)
